name: Tata Tigor
description: The price of Tata Tigor, a 5 seater Compact Sedan, ranges from Rs. 6.30  - 9.55 Lakh. It is available in 11 variants, with an engine of 1199 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Tigor has an NCAP rating of 4 stars and comes with 2 airbags. Tata Tigor has a ground clearance of 170 mm  and is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 19.2 to 28.06 kmpl for Tigor.
